reviewText: Viewed this movie yesterday, had waited so long to get a copy and it was certainly worth waiting for.  Loved it. Rock Hudson at his usual romantic best.  A little different to his usual movies but still a good movie. Buy it and enjoy.
will not play in english love the movie
Absolutely loved this movie.  Fun, romantic, great story.  Rock Hudson handsome as ever.  Great acting by Hudson and especially DeCarlo.
Like the old movies of my youth and was happy to find these on Amazon.
Times were different in the 4os and 50s great scenery love story and beautiful  people.
Really enjoy Yvonne De Carlo movies, this one is no exception.  The seller is great.

Scarlet Angel was released in 1952. A wonderful film starring Yvonne De Carlo and Rock Hudson. So fun to watch these great stars entertain us in the story of a woman pretending to be someone she's not. Fans of Yvonne De Carlo and Rock Hudson will like this the most.
Have waited to get a decent (not bootleg) copy of this for years, and my mother looked even longer before me!! Thank You!!
my kind of a movie,a classic
